data.value: A, ki te wehi koe e kore koe e mahi tika ki te kotiro pani, ka marena te hunga e pai koutou o [te tahi atu] wahine, e rua, e toru nga ranei wha.

data.name: Quran497
data.value: Na hoatu nga wahine [i runga i te faaipoiporaa] ratou [taumau] hakari atawhai.

data.name: Quran498
data.value: A e kore e hoatu e te ngoikore-whakaaro koutou taonga, i hanga nei e kua Allah he tikanga o te oranga mo koutou, engari whakarato hoki ratou ki taua mea, ka whakakakahu ratou, ka korero ki a ratou nga kupu o e tika ana atawhai.

data.name: Quran499
data.value: Na whakamatautau nga pani [i roto i to ratou aravihi] noa tae ratou tau tane.

data.name: Quran500
data.value: No te tangata ko te wahi o te mea nga mātua me whanaunga tata waiho, a hoki nga wahine ko te wahi o te mea nga mātua me whanaunga tata waiho, kia reira iti nui ranei - he wahi obligatory.

data.name: Quran501
data.value: A, no ka e kitea i te [wa o] wehenga [atu] whanaunga me pani me te rawakore, ka whakarato hoki ratou [te tahi mea] i roto i te whenua, me te korero ki a ratou nga kupu o e tika ana atawhai.

data.name: Quran502

data.name: Quran506

data.value: Mea atu, "Ko ia Allah, [e ko] Kotahi,

data.name: Quran6223
data.value: Allah, te Refuge Mure.

data.name: Quran6224
data.value: e kore ia whanau ranei te whanau,

data.name: Quran6225
data.value: E kore ano he reira ki a ia tetahi ōrite. "

data.name: Quran6226
data.value: Mea atu, "rapu whakawhirinaki ahau i roto i te Ariki o te atatu

data.name: Quran6227
data.value: Mai i te kino o taua i hanga e ia ki

data.name: Quran6228
data.value: A i te kino o te pouri, ina mutu ai te reira

data.name: Quran6229
data.value: A i te kino o nga blowers i roto i knots

data.name: Quran6230
data.value: A i te kino o te envier ina hae ia. "

data.name: Quran6231
data.value: Mea atu, "rapu whakawhirinaki ahau i roto i te Ariki o te taata nei,

data.name: Quran6232
data.value: Te Ariki, o te taata.

data.name: Quran6233
data.value: Te Atua o te taata nei,

data.name: Quran6234
data.value: Mai i te kino o te tangata kawekawe korero whati -

data.name: Quran6235
data.value: Ko wai muhumuhu [kino] ki te u o te taata -

data.name: Quran6236
data.value: I roto i te jinn me te taata. "
